    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • createInitialScreen

        public void createInitialScreen()
        Method creates the components shown initially when the application is started. These components are MainMenu and WelcomeScreen.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Method creates the main game UI components which are the MainUI which holds the grids to show ship locations and targeting and the game menu/info-panel.

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        New game method. If a game is currently running, the method will ask confirmation to start a new game. Method removes last games UI from the screen if applicable. After, the method will start a new Game and asks for players name and difficulty level. Name can be blank, but if cancel is pressed or a dialog closed, the method will exit without starting a new game.

      • shoot

        public void shoot(Location loc)
        Method sets the players target location to the given location and updates the view.
        Parameters:
        loc - Players target location

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Returns the game currently running.
        Returns:
        game being played currently

      • showPlayerHitMessage

        public void showPlayerHitMessage()
        Method shows a message informing the player of a scored hit

      • playMissSound

        public void playMissSound()
        Plays a sound indicating a missed shot using the sound player.

      • showPlayerSinkAIShipMessage

        public void showPlayerSinkAIShipMessage()
        Method displays a message informing player that an AI ship has been sunk.

      • showAISinkPlayerShipMessage

        public void showAISinkPlayerShipMessage()
